race.description: Must not be none if the name should be selected from random templates.

random_name_template.description: [string]If not empty, use a random name from the name list and insert it into the NAME localization variable of the template.

character_name.description: [string]The localization string identifier of the character name, as displayed in subtitles.

use_persistent_seed.description: [bool]If set, this character uses a predictable seed based on peer id. This is most useful for ship characters.
